```{r}
library(sf)

queen_contiguity <- st_intersects(uitk::suffolk_county)
```


```{r}
#https://spatialanalysis.github.io/lab_tutorials/Contiguity_Spatial_Weights.html#queen-contiguity
st_queen <- function(a, b = a) st_relate(a, b, pattern = "F***T****")

st_queen(uitk::suffolk_county)
```
